prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that floats gracefully with a slender body and large expressive eyes.
Imagine a legendary creature with a soft pink hue and a long, flexible tail, filled with mystery.
Generate a cute, small Pokemon with playful blue eyes and a unique ability to use psychic powers.
Design a mythical creature resembling a small cat, featuring a charming expression and a whimsical tail.
Show me a rare Pokemon that embodies tranquility and possesses the power to influence dreams and thoughts.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in mystical forests, showcasing a light, ethereal appearance.
Make a tiny Pokemon with a sleek body, known for its elusive nature and incredible agility.
